DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , single-masked , sham injection-controlled study investigate exposure-response safety lampalizumab administer intravitreally every 2 week ( Q2W ) every 4 week ( Q4W ) 24 week participant geographic atrophy ( GA ) secondary age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) . The anticipated time study treatment 24 week . The target sample size approximately 90 participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Lampalizumab Intravitreal Injections Administered Every Two Weeks Every Four Weeks Participants With Geographic Atrophy
